Class WarPlayer

java.lang.Object
players.AbstractPlayer<PlayingCard>
players.WarPlayer
public class WarPlayer extends AbstractPlayer<PlayingCard>
Class representing a Player for the game War. Each player has a hand, and a Stack of cards that they have won playing war. When their hand runs out, the stack of cards should be put back in their hand.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class players.AbstractPlayer

    • returnCollectedCardsToHand

      public boolean returnCollectedCardsToHand()
      Method to return all the cards won from war back to original hand.
      Returns:
      true if the player's hand is not empty, i.e. something was returned.
